Modeling the Capital Structure: Bibliography

Callahan, Gene. 2004. Economics for real people: an introduction to the Austrian school. Auburn, Ala: Ludwig von Mises Institute.

Lachmann, Ludwig E. 1978. Capital and its structure. Sheed Andrews and McMeel, Inc.: Kansas City.

Callahan, Gene, and Roger Garrison. 2003. "Does austrian business cycle theory help explain the dot-com boom and bust?" The Quarterly Journal of Austrian Economics.i 6 (2): 67-98.
